member.name: M:MyFire_storage.Data.Reset(System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection)
member.summary: Resets the settings to their default values.

member.name: M:MyFire_storage.Data.Users_ReturnUserList
member.summary: Returns a list of currently authorized users.

member.name: M:MyFire_storage.Data.Users_WriteSingleUser(MyFire_storage.StoredUser)
member.summary: Writes a user to the XMLUserList.

member.name: M:MyFire_storage.Data.Users_DeleteSingleUser(MyFire_storage.StoredUser)
member.summary: Deleted the user from the user store.

member.name: M:MyFire_storage.Data.Users_ListOfScreenNames
member.summary: Returns a list of Screen Names for use around the application.

member.name: M:MyFire_storage.Data.SetDefaultUser(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the default user from the list of users.
member.param: The screen name of the user to be made default.
member.remarks: Will throw a KeyNotFoundException if no user was found.

member.name: M:MyFire_storage.Data.GetDefaultUser
member.summary: Gets the default user from the list of users.
member.returns: A SturedUser object for the default user.
member.remarks: Will throw a KeyNotFoundException if no default user was found.
